splits.name: Celsius Holdings, Inc.
splits.notes: Board approved Nov 2, 2023. Record date Nov 13, 2023. Distributed Nov 14, 2023. Split-adjusted trading began Nov 15, 2023.

splits.name: Churchill Downs, Incorporated
splits.notes: Board approved Apr 25, 2023. Record date May 5, 2023. Distributed May 19, 2023. Split-adjusted trading began May 22, 2023.

splits.name: Copart, Inc.
splits.notes: Board approved Aug 4, 2023. Record date Aug 14, 2023. Distributed Aug 21, 2023. Split-adjusted trading began Aug 22, 2023. Shares outstanding increased from ~480M to ~960M.

splits.name: Mueller Industries, Inc.
splits.notes: Board declared Sep 26, 2023. Record date Oct 6, 2023. Distributed Oct 20, 2023. Split-adjusted trading began Oct 23, 2023.

splits.name: Monster Beverage Corporation
splits.notes: Announced Feb 28, 2023 during Q4 2022 earnings. Record date Mar 13, 2023. Distributed Mar 27, 2023. Split-adjusted trading began Mar 28, 2023.

splits.name: Meridian Corporation
splits.notes: Board approved Feb 28, 2023. Record date Mar 14, 2023. Distributed Mar 20, 2023. Split-adjusted trading began Mar 21, 2023. Post-split shares outstanding: 11,405,184.

splits.name: Novo Nordisk A/S
splits.notes: Board approved Aug 10, 2023. Copenhagen B shares split effective Sep 13, 2023. NYSE ADR split effective Sep 20, 2023. Maintained 1:1 relationship between B-share and ADR.

splits.name: PACCAR Inc
splits.notes: Board declared Dec 5, 2022. 50% stock dividend (3-for-2 split). Record date Jan 17, 2023. Distributed Feb 7, 2023. Split-adjusted trading began Feb 8, 2023.

splits.name: Sempra
splits.notes: Board declared Aug 3, 2023. Record date Aug 14, 2023. Distributed Aug 21, 2023. Split-adjusted trading began Aug 22, 2023.
